author: Jacky Wong
title: The News Is Good for Baidu - WSJ
text:
China’s search-engine giant Baidu has found a way to make its users stick around: tailored news content generated by artificial intelligence. This is also good news for the company’s investors.
Nasdaq-listed Baidu has been on a roll lately. Its revenue last quarter grew 31% from a year ago, after adjusting for accounting changes. Baidu expects the strong growth to continue, forecasting sales could increase by around one-third again this quarter, excluding disposed businesses. Its stock jumped 5.6% in after-hours trading.
...
